All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Auction
Class which manages the backend of the application Implements serializable, so we can store all the information about the current auction and send it to others via internet
AuctionController
class that controls especially the auction flow and its GUI
AuctionFollower
interface that informs all objects which are implementing it
AuctionObserver
Part of the OBSERVER PATTERN abstract Class that object implements
Bot
Class extended from the User class It contains more information, such as Bots iq and artificial brain
CommonItem
Class common item that creates the current item and also makes a base for other classes
CommonUnit
Common unit is the class creating the base of other units.
Context
Part of the STRATEGY PATTERN it handles all strategies and is calling actual function that is about to be executed
DBUtils
Utility class which manages all the database connections
EndMenuController
Class that controls end menu statistics
EpicItem
Class Epic item that is extended from Rare item class it contains different values
EpicUnit
Class creates an epic unit
IncorrectPasswordFormatException
User defined exception class
LoginController
Class that controls the login menu of the FX application
Main
Application starts inside this Main class Run main to start
MysteriousItem
Class Mysterious item that is extended from Epic item class it contains different values
MysteriousUnit
Creates a mysterious unit containing special items inside
OperationAddMoney
Part of the STRATEGY PATTERN It creates an operation addition
OperationSubMoney
Part of the STRATEGY PATTERN It creates an operation subtraction
RareItem
Class Rare item that is extended from Common item class it contains different values
RareUnit
Class that creates a Rare Unit and gives it its own information It is extended from the common unit
RegistrationController
Class that controls the flow of the registration
StorageUnitType
Part of the Factory pattern
StrategyAddSubMoney
Part of the STRATEGY PATTERN Defines what implemented classes should contain
UnitFactory
Part of the FACTORY PATTERN Class that generates storage units randomly
User
Class containing all the needed information about the user Such as name, passwod, balance, units bought and actual unit
